    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(java.lang.String password,
          boolean encrypted)
        Change an authenticated local user's own password. Accepts a clear test password or a password already hashed by the caller. If both form fields are specified, bad request will be returned. User is automatically logged out after password reset.

        API Call: PUT /password

        Parameters:
        password - The clear text or encrypted password
        encrypted - If true, the supplied password is already hashed

      • update

        public void update(java.lang.String password,
          boolean encrypted,
          boolean logoutUser)
        Change an authenticated local user's own password. Accepts a clear test password or a password already hashed by the caller. If both form fields are specified, bad request will be returned.

        API Call: PUT /password

        Parameters:
        password - The clear text or encrypted password
        encrypted - If true, the supplied password is already hashed
        logoutUser - If true, logout the user after updating the password

      • update

        public void update(java.lang.String username,
          java.lang.String password,
          boolean encrypted)
        Change a given local user's password. The authenticated caller must have SEC_ADMIN role. User is automatically logged out after password reset.

        API Call: PUT /password/reset

        Parameters:
        username - The local user name
        password - Clear text or encrypted password
        encrypted - If true, the provided password is encrypted

      • update

        public void update(java.lang.String username,
          java.lang.String password,
          boolean encrypted,
          boolean logoutUser)
        Change a given local user's password. The authenticated caller must have SEC_ADMIN role.

        API Call: PUT /password/reset

        Parameters:
        username - The local user name
        password - Clear text or encrypted password
        encrypted - If true, the provided password is encrypted
        logoutUser - If true, logout the user after updating the password

      • updateAuthorizedKey2

        public void updateAuthorizedKey2(java.lang.String sshKey)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Change an authenticated local user's SSH authorizedkey2. This interface accepts the user's SSH authorizedkey2

        API Call: PUT /password/authorizedkey2

        Parameters:
        sshKey - the SSH key
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
